Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities place (other) humans in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man, also known as Jehoahaz (יְהֹואָחָז) ◄ son of Joram (יְהֹורָם) ► king of southern kingdom of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which humans are relatively young, ≈ which is sometimes associated with being weak and inexperienced, but also with being healthy
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

= a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose it is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army
= inhabitant of Arabia (עֲרַב)
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) ► king of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (848 841)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= state in which humans and animals have a certain age, ◄ referred to as a child of a certain number of years
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ son of Omri (עָמְרִי) ► king of northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) husband of Jezebel (אִיזֶבֶל) father of Ahaziah (אֲחַזְיָהוּ) and Joram (יְהֹורָם)
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= a person whose official role and responsibility it is to give advice to someone in authority
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is contrary to (God's) law, ► resulting in a state of guilt

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ son of Omri (עָמְרִי) ► king of northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) husband of Jezebel (אִיזֶבֶל) father of Ahaziah (אֲחַזְיָהוּ) and Joram (יְהֹורָם)
= a person whose official role and responsibility it is to give advice to someone in authority
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= process by which humans or animals stop living
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans go to a location where they will not be readily seen by others; ► in order to be safe from danger or to attack someone else
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= woman; ► wife of Joram (יֹורָם) queen of Judah (יְהוּדָה) (841 835)

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
